entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
